alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick, south central Columbus and east central Horry Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Myrtle Beach Airport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Myrtle Beach, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Little River, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Little River Entrance, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Civie Town, Longwood, Seaside, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Wampee, Ash, Cherry Grove Beach, and Grissettown. This includes the following highways... US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 21. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 16 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 25 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
